title: How To Trap a Cougar Vs. How To Trap a Cub
description: This funny and insightful guide illustrates the wonderful magic between cougars and cubs. Older women, younger men, and the love they share for one another, all wrapped in a great package that will make you laugh as well as appreciate the joy that may come from relationships some may frown upon... but which will make others smile for a lifetime.
author: Ben Peller
